paper_abstract: We study the palindromic complexity of infinite words u(beta), the fixed points of the substitution over a binary alphabet, phi(0) = 0(a)1, phi(1) = 0(b)1, with a - 1 >= b >= 1, which are canonically associated with quadratic non-simple Parry numbers beta.
paper_title: PALINDROMIC COMPLEXITY OF INFINITE WORDS ASSOCIATED WITH NON-SIMPLE PARRY NUMBERS
